snippet.title: Death end re;Quest™ 2 (PS4™/Steam®) - Welcome to Le Choara Trailer
snippet.description:
ESRB Rating: M for Mature - Blood, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence

Wishlist the Limited Edition only at IFI's Online Store: https://bit.ly/DERQ2-LE
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/DERQ2-Steam
Preorder the game at IFI's Online Store: https://bit.ly/DERQ2-SE
Preorders also available on Amazon, Best Buy, and GameStop!
Learn more: http://ifi.games/death-request-2

Out: August 25 (NA) / August 28 (Europe)

From the twisted mind of scenario writer Makoto Kedouin (Corpse Party), comes the horror-influenced RPG sequel Death end re;Quest 2, out August 25/28 (NA/Europe) for both PlayStation®4 and Steam.

A girl escaping a traumatic past finds herself in the eerie mountain town of Le Choara in search of her sister. She soon discovers the sleepy town awakens at night with terrifying Shadow Matter - though few seem to see them. Can she unearth the town's secret history, or will darkness consume the very fabric of her reality?

KEY FEATURES
- Day n' Night - Investigate the secrets of Le Choara's history by day, and battle the nightmares that emerge at night. Can you survive till dawn?

- Don’t Call it a Knockback – The Knockback System returns from the first game, letting you ricochet enemies around the battlefield and into allies to perform chain attacks and Overkills during turn-based battles!

- Beware of the Berserker – From creatures that give chase in dungeons to the invincible and deadly Berserker, Shadow Matter enemies pose threats from every dark corner of town.

- Choosing Fate - Your choices can affect who survives till the end, or even trigger immediate game overs. But is there a benefit to these sudden deaths?
